org.apache.flink.runtime.deployment

类 TaskDeploymentDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.deployment.TaskDeploymentDescriptor
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class TaskDeploymentDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A task deployment descriptor contains all the information necessary to deploy a task on a task manager.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  TaskDeploymentDescriptor.MaybeOffloaded<T>
      Wrapper class for serialized values which may be offloaded to the BlobServer or not.
      static class  TaskDeploymentDescriptor.NonOffloaded<T>
      A serialized value that is not offloaded to the BlobServer.
      static class  TaskDeploymentDescriptor.Offloaded<T>
      Reference to a serialized value that was offloaded to the BlobServer.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private AllocationID allocationId
      The allocation ID of the slot in which the task shall be run.
      private int attemptNumber
      Attempt number the task.
      private ExecutionAttemptID executionId
      The ID referencing the attempt to execute the task.
      private java.util.Collection<InputGateDeploymentDescriptor> inputGates
      The list of consumed intermediate result partitions.
      private JobID jobId
      The ID referencing the job this task belongs to.
      private java.util.Collection<ResultPartitionDeploymentDescriptor> producedPartitions
      The list of produced intermediate result partition deployment descriptors.
      private TaskDeploymentDescriptor.MaybeOffloaded<JobInformation> serializedJobInformation
      Serialized job information or null if offloaded.
      private TaskDeploymentDescriptor.MaybeOffloaded<TaskInformation> serializedTaskInformation
      Serialized task information or null if offloaded.
      private static long serialVersionUID 
      private int subtaskIndex
      The task's index in the subtask group.
      private int targetSlotNumber
      Slot number to run the sub task in on the target machine.
      private TaskStateSnapshot taskStateHandles
      State handles for the sub task.

    • 字段详细资料

      • serialVersionUID

        private static final long serialVersionUID
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • serializedJobInformation

        private TaskDeploymentDescriptor.MaybeOffloaded<JobInformation> serializedJobInformation
        Serialized job information or null if offloaded.

      • serializedTaskInformation

        private TaskDeploymentDescriptor.MaybeOffloaded<TaskInformation> serializedTaskInformation
        Serialized task information or null if offloaded.

      • jobId

        private final JobID jobId
        The ID referencing the job this task belongs to.

        NOTE: this is redundant to the information stored in serializedJobInformation but needed in order to restore offloaded data.

      • executionId

        private final ExecutionAttemptID executionId
        The ID referencing the attempt to execute the task.

      • allocationId

        private final AllocationID allocationId
        The allocation ID of the slot in which the task shall be run.

      • subtaskIndex

        private final int subtaskIndex
        The task's index in the subtask group.

      • attemptNumber

        private final int attemptNumber
        Attempt number the task.

      • producedPartitions

        private final java.util.Collection<ResultPartitionDeploymentDescriptor> producedPartitions
        The list of produced intermediate result partition deployment descriptors.

      • inputGates

        private final java.util.Collection<InputGateDeploymentDescriptor> inputGates
        The list of consumed intermediate result partitions.

      • targetSlotNumber

        private final int targetSlotNumber
        Slot number to run the sub task in on the target machine.

      • taskStateHandles

        private final TaskStateSnapshot taskStateHandles
        State handles for the sub task.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getSerializedJobInformation

        @Nullable
public SerializedValue<JobInformation> getSerializedJobInformation()
        Return the sub task's serialized job information.
        返回:
        serialized job information (may be null before a call to loadBigData(PermanentBlobService)).

      • getSerializedTaskInformation

        @Nullable
public SerializedValue<TaskInformation> getSerializedTaskInformation()
        Return the sub task's serialized task information.
        返回:
        serialized task information (may be null before a call to loadBigData(PermanentBlobService)).

      • getJobId

        public JobID getJobId()
        Returns the task's job ID.
        返回:
        the job ID this task belongs to

        返回:
        the task's index in the subtask group

      • getAttemptNumber

        public int getAttemptNumber()
        Returns the attempt number of the subtask.

      • getTargetSlotNumber

        public int getTargetSlotNumber()
        Gets the number of the slot into which the task is to be deployed.
        返回:
        The number of the target slot.

        public AllocationID getAllocationId()

      • loadBigData

        public void loadBigData(@Nullable
                        PermanentBlobService blobService)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Loads externalized data from the BLOB store back to the object.
        参数:
        blobService - the blob store to use (may be null if serializedJobInformation and serializedTaskInformation are non-null)
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - during errors retrieving or reading the BLOBs
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Class of a serialized object cannot be found.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
